messages.message: Hey team, I’ve seen a demo of Aihub chatbot functionality where we’ve imported all the IB documentation. I’d be interested in using that chatbot as a user. Does anyone know where there lives and how I can access it.
Then can we add the academy to it’s knowledge? :eyes:
I have it @Orlando - can send it over tomorrow
I feel like I’m it’s ideal target user
@Tom Deaney can you share with Nithin too

Great idea! Here's a demo of the AI Hub docs chatbot - https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/a9ac0a9b-c2c9-4f9a-8c92-e93f4572bc63.

Currently this is a demo chatbot and the knowledge base isn't regularly updated with the latest docs. @jean let's discuss how we can create a more official docs chatbot for the team as well :slightly_smiling_face: It'll get easier to maintain once we build the URL input feature in 24.16
